# Feed this file to script/make-artificial.go

make gif

header

image {
	imageWidthHeight 2 2
	palette {
		0x00 0x00 0xFF
		0x11 0x00 0xFF
		0x22 0x00 0xFF
		0x33 0x00 0xFF
	}
}

frame {
	frameLeftTopWidthHeight 0 0 2 2
}
# The frame is 4 pixels, but we supply 5.
lzw 2 0x00 0x00 0x00 0x00 0x00

trailer
